description: Request acknowledgement of policies easily with the straightforward form.
name: Policy Acknowledgement Form

steps.title: Policy Acknowledgement Form
steps.text: Please complete the fields below to confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to comply with the specified policy. Your acknowledgment is essential to ensure that all employees are informed and adhere to our company policies.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Provide your email address for communication regarding your request.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Optional: Enter your phone number for any necessary follow-up.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Policy Title
blocks.help: Specify the title of the policy being acknowledged.
blocks.name: policy_title

blocks.label: Policy Description
blocks.help: Briefly describe the policy or include a summary.
blocks.name: policy_description

blocks.label: Date of Policy
blocks.help: Enter the effective date of the policy.
blocks.name: policy_date

blocks.label: I have read and understand the policy.
blocks.name: acknowledgement_statement

blocks.label: Signature
blocks.help: Sign to confirm your acknowledgment and agreement with the policy.
blocks.name: signature
